com.iciql
Interface SQLDialect

All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLDialectDefault, SQLDialectDerby, SQLDialectH2, SQLDialectHSQL, SQLDialectMySQL, SQLDialectPostgreSQL
public interface SQLDialect

This interface defines points where iciql can build different statements depending on the database used.

prepareParameter

When building static string statements this method flattens an object to a string representation suitable for a static string statement.

Returns:
the string equivalent of this object
